ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh.  I said the same thing long ago.  You will change your tune real quick once you get popped a couple times for 50-70 damage per attack from a mob
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Sep 1999, JasonF wrote:
>
> The bronze looks absolutely stupid (I personally don't even like the color)
> and I intend to skip over it entirely due to the weight primarily, but also
> because of the look.

Heh heh. I said the same thing long ago. You will change
your tune real quick once you get popped a couple times for
50-70 damage per attack from a mob that double or triple
attacks. Suddenly giving up 80% of your weight capacity for a
few measly extra AC doesn't seem like that bad a trade-off...
:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
